DOC.detailed_description: For prevention recurrent esophageal variceal bleeding , previous clinical study meta-analysis show patient treat transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt ( TIPS ) low rebleeding rate compare endoscopic therapy . However , TIPS associate high rate portosystemic encephalopathy show survival benefit . TIPS small-diameter may achieve sufficient portal decompression reduce incidence hepatic encephalopathy . The aim study conduct prospective randomize trial compare TIPS 8mm ePTFE-covered stent endoscopic variceal ligation plus propranolol prevention recurrent esophageal variceal bleeding .
